knimeNode.name: LOCI to KNIME images
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts the images from LOCI Plate Reader to KNIME imaging format.

fullDescription.intro: Based on the information from LOCI Plate Reader it converts the images present in that format to KNIME image format.
fullDescription.option: When selected the first (at most) 3 (grey-scale) channels will be combined to RGB images.

ports.inPort: A port with references to images.
A port where the readers are present.
